headline: Steve Sanghi to Continue as Microchip CEO and President on a Permanent Basis
summary: Mr. Sanghi Has Been Serving in Such Roles on an Interim Basis Since November 2024CHANDLER, Ariz., July 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- (NASDAQ: MCHP) – Microchip Technology Incorporated, a leading provider of smart, connected, and secure embedded control solutions, today announced that Steve Sanghi has agreed to continue to serve as the company’s Chief Executive Officer and President on a permanent basis. Mr. Sanghi had been serving in such roles on an interim basis since November 2024. Mr. Sanghi

headline: Microchip Technology (NasdaqGS:MCHP) Partners To Advance ASA-ML Cameras In Japanese Automotive Market
summary: Microchip Technology (NasdaqGS:MCHP) recently made headlines with its strategic partnerships and product innovations, such as the ASA-ML camera-development platform tailored for the Japanese automotive market. These initiatives showcase the company’s commitment to advancing in the automotive industry, focusing on high-speed data and cybersecurity. Despite a 46% price surge in the last quarter, compared to a 14% annual market rise, broader technology sector gains and favorable market...

headline: Microchip Partners with Nippon Chemi-Con and NetVision on First ASA-ML Camera Development Ecosystem for Japanese Automotive Market
summary: Ecosystem’s camera module and development tools are based on Microchip’s VS700 family of serializers and deserializers and will help Japanese OEMs speed ASA-ML adoption in ADAS applicationsCHANDLER, Ariz., July 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- An automotive industry transition is underway to replace proprietary camera connectivity with solutions based on the open and interoperable Automotive Serdes Alliance Motion Link (ASA-ML) standard driven by over 150 member companies worldwide.
